Posts.Content: maggiestatas wrote: I went for a mammogram 7/18 had an ultrasound guided core biopsy 7/19  received a 4pm phone call 7/21 with a  diagnosis of  invasive ductal carcinoma and told to make an appointment with a surgeon. I don't know how I feel I am so confused. I spent today making a new patient appointment with a local cancer hospital getting films, reports. I now have appointment Monday for a MRI  7/25/11 and an appointment with a surgeon Tuesday. .. I don't have a family Doctor . I have never written anything on the internet before. I have read some postings but I find I am just getting overwhelmed. Dx 7/21/2011, IDC, Left, 2cm, Stage IIB, Grade 2, 0/5 nodes, ER+/PR+, HER2- (IHC) Surgery 8/31/2011 Mastectomy: Left; Prophylactic mastectomy: Right Chemotherapy 10/10/2011 Cytoxan (cyclophosphamide), Taxotere (docetaxel) Surgery 1/31/2012 Reconstruction (left); Reconstruction (right) Radiation Therapy 4/2/2012 3DCRT: Breast, Chest wall Hormonal Therapy 5/9/2012 Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: Very confused and scared maggiestatas AnnieBear
